AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: person who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by the harsh conditions of the South Texas desert trek
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas, found to have recklessly contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the smuggling incident occurred, imposing sentencing enhancements for alien smuggling offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: location of the smuggling journey guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, characterized by harsh desert conditions in June that contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IIRIRA: Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996, related to alien smuggling offense sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.House Conference Report No. 104-863: a report related to alien smuggling offense sentencing, detailing the imposition of sentencing enhancements for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury
